ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Shiverback
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, I had to go to Hate to get my boots.  Not once, in all my time in Fear have boots dropped. To my knowledge, boots are the only piece of Shiverback that
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, I had to go to Hate to get my boots. Not once, in all my time in Fear
have boots dropped.

To my knowledge, boots are the only piece of Shiverback that drops from
Chests.

Phobos have dropped gloves several times for me. I think my bracer came
from a phobo too, but I'm not sure.

Lei

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean O'Brien [mailto:sobrien@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 30, 2000 7:00 PM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Shiverback



Well after a week in fear, I got 1 bracer, 2 gloves, 2 arms, 2 legs.
Most of the time I was the only monk in fear (or even close to fear) so
I got to loot whatever dropped, and I got doubles when the corpses were
going to "poof". I got most of it in the first night. The last 2 nights
1 bracer dropped and I let the other monk who was there have it. In the
times I missed, I heard of 2 jerkins and 1 pair of boots dropping.

Only 1 bracer, a jerkin and boots to go. And infact I only want the
boots.

How common are the boots usually ? (weren't very common this last week
;p).

What parts drop off of chests in hate ?
Do the boots drop off phobos ?
